item.title: CISCO ios port forwarding y dynamic dns(DDNS)
item.description: Basic Configuration: https://youtube.com/watch?v=3wuFFYVWnbc Port Forwarding: https://youtube.com/watch?v=8WVWoW86Uhw Dynamic DNS: https://youtube.com/watch?v=Zh39hgRJwGE https://content.cisco.com/chapter.sjs?uri=/searchable/chapter/content/en/us/td/docs/ios-xml/ios/ipaddr_dns/configuration/15-sy/dns-15-sy-book/Dynamic-DNS-Support.html.xml https://ipwithease.com/how-to-configure-ddns-in-a-cisco-router/ DDNS y NoIP: https://www.firewall.cx/cisco/cisco-routers/cisco-router-ddns.html Setup DNNS on a Cisco IOS Router: https://www.bytesolutions.com/setup-ddns-dynamic-dns-cisco-ios-router/ ================================= Basic Router Commands ================================= Router(greater than sign) ---User EXEC mode exit Router(greater than sign) ? Router(greater than sign) enable --------------- Router# ---Privileged EXEC mode disable, exit Router# ? ----------------- Router# configure terminal Router(config)# ---Global Config mode exit, end, Ctrl+c, Ctrl+z Router(config)# ? ----------------- Router(config)# line vty 0 15 Router(config)# line console 0 Router(config-line)# ---Line configuration mode exit, end, Ctrl+c, Ctrl+z Router(config-line)# ?
